\hypertarget{namespacechaos}{\section{chaos Namespace Reference}

the global Chaos\-Core namespace which contains everything within Chaos\-Core.

\subsection{Detailed Description}
the global Chaos\-Core namespace which contains everything within Chaos\-Core.
